#summary Log me Off.

= don't pull tagged Mobs =
  * If enabled the Bot will not try to pull already tagged Mobs 
  * You could choose 2 Behaviors how he should react instead:
=== wait who wins ===
He will wait who wins the fight and pull the Mob if he kills the other Player
=== blacklist tagged Mobs ===
he will blacklist the Mob for some minutes and fly away
